sentences.en: a double period of Science
sentences.cn: 一连两节的自然科学课

sentences.en: A sense of period was evoked by complementing pictures with appropriate furniture.
sentences.cn: 给照片配上一些合适的家具，唤起了一种年代感。

sentences.en: Add up all the income you've received over the period in question.
sentences.cn: 把那个时期里你拿到的所有收入加在一起。

sentences.en: After a further four-month extension of her probation period, she was sacked.
sentences.cn: 在又试用了4个月后，她被开除了。

sentences.en: He was transferred to Shoal Creek Mental Institution for an indefinite period.
sentences.cn: 他被转到了肖尔溪精神病院，要在那里无限期地呆下去。

sentences.en: Helen described life in a weightless environment during her period in space.
sentences.cn: 海伦描述了她身处太空时失重状态下的生活。

sentences.en: in dry climates, the onset of summer drought may put a period to plant activity.
sentences.cn: 在干燥的气候条件下，夏季干旱的开始就可能使植物丧失活力。

sentences.en: It was a period of collective insanity, of legalized murder and mayhem.
sentences.cn: 那是个集体丧失理智、谋杀与暴力合法化的时期。

sentences.en: Many policies pay out only after a period of weeks or months.
sentences.cn: 很多保单在几周或几个月后才得以赔付。

sentences.en: Nothing seems certain in this crucial period in Pakistan's political life.
sentences.cn: 在巴基斯坦政治历史上的这个紧要关头,一切皆非定数.

sentences.en: Over a given period, the value of shares will rise and fall.
sentences.cn: 股票的价值在某一特定的时期内会有涨跌。

sentences.en: Over the same period trade protection has increased in the rich countries.
sentences.cn: 在同一时期，富国的贸易保护有所抬头。

sentences.en: Pay attention to punctuation, especially to the correct use of commas and periods.
sentences.cn: 注意标点，特别是逗号和句号的正确使用方法。

sentences.en: Right now we are in the changeover period between autumn and winter.
sentences.cn: 眼下，我们正处于秋冬交替的时候。

sentences.en: South Africa was going through a period of irreversible change.
sentences.cn: 南非正在经历一场不可逆转的变革。

sentences.en: The drug was tested over a five-week period.
sentences.cn: 那种药品进行了为期五周的试验。

sentences.en: The factory was due to shut for the festive period.
sentences.cn: 节日期间工厂将关门。

sentences.en: The gestation period can be anything between 95 and 150 days.
sentences.cn: 妊娠期从95天至150天不等。

sentences.en: The next few weeks will be a period of readjustment.
sentences.cn: 接下来的几周将是适应阶段。

sentences.en: They adopted the system for a trial period (= time in which something is tested to see if it works well ) .
sentences.cn: 那套系统他们试用了一段时间。

sentences.en: Tomorrow’s weather will be dry with sunny periods.
sentences.cn: 明天天气干燥，间或晴朗。

words.tran_cn: 定期地；周期性地；偶尔；间歇

phrases.tran_cn: n. 发展期；发育期；开发期
adj. 短周期的；短过期的
保藏期，储存期；贮藏期；蓄水期

trans.tran_cn: 一段时间，阶段，时期，课，月经，句号
trans.tran_en: a particular length of time with a beginning and an end
